Pontiac.Ultimate Soccer Arenas: Ultimate Soccer Arenas is an indoor soccer-specific stadium in Pontiac, Michigan. The facility is one of the largest fully enclosed full-size association football arenas in the United States. It features two AstroTurf pitches: one is a full-size 110x75-yard pitch with a 5,000-seat stadium, while the other is an 85x47-yard pitch.
